remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定名称是因调用方法`T`。The contract name is the result of calling the method on `T`. 通过使用比较的协定名称属性来执行区分大小写、 非语义比较。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认协定名称是因调用方法`type`。The default contract name is the result of calling the method on `type`. 通过使用比较的协定名称属性来执行区分大小写、 非语义比较。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> GetExportsCore(class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition definition, class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition atomicComposition) cil managed

param.span: 定义要返回的 对象的条件的对象。

span.span: The object that defines the conditions of the objects to return.

param.name: atomicComposition
param.span: 组合的事务性容器。

span.span: The transactional container for the composition.

summary.span: 获取与指定的定义所定义的约束匹配的所有导出。

span.span: Gets all the exports that match the constraint defined by the specified definition.

returns.span: 一个包含与指定的条件匹配的所有导出的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains all the exports that match the specified condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法不应基数相关的不匹配将视为错误，并且不应在这些情况下引发异常。Overrides of this method should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors, and should not throw exceptions in those cases. 例如，如果是且没有任何与指定的条件匹配的对象，空应返回集合。For example, if is and there are zero objects that match the conditions of the specified , an empty collection should be returned.
